profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.6.1 Actions General - Named actions
profile.description: Named actions other than NextPage, PrevPage, FirstPage, and LastPage shall not be permitted
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: Named actions other than NextPage, PrevPage, FirstPage, and LastPage shall not be permitted

error.message: Unknown or not permitted action type
